summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 1, Law's Addition and block 15, Capitol Hill Addition, Division No. 2, being the alley between 15th Avenue North and 16th Avenue North, and from East Mercer Street to East Roy Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 105143 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
